short.ja: モニカと一緒に時間を過ごすためにアニメーションや対話を点滅してドキのドキ文学クラブ（DDLC）ゲームからモニカのスクリーンセーバー。

short.ru: Заставка Моники из доков доков литературы клуба игры (DDLC) с мигающей анимацией и диалогами, чтобы провести время с Моникой.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
This extension displays a screensaver of Monika with Blinking animation and dialogues from Doki Doki Literature Club (DDLC) game:

Youtube Preview - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fLzNnrwEcWE
Website - https://kronosdevstudio.com

Features:

* Animated screensaver.
* Wait time after machine becomes idle to display screensaver
* A scheduler to control when the screensaver, display, and computer should remain on
* Background sound
* Do not display over full screen Chrome windows (e.g., YouTube, Netflix)
* Do not show screensaver when a media (e.g. Video, Audio) is playing
* Do not show screensaver when browser is minimized
* Display time
* Show on all displays
* Support multiple languages

Works great on all platforms.

Please rate this if you find it of value. Thank you.

Social Links:

* Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/kronosdevstudio
* Twitter - https://twitter.com/kronosdevstudio

Disclaimer:

This is a fan made extension. I do not own any images or audio content used in this extension. All credit and rights goes to the creater of game.

Website - https://kronosdevstudio.com

Features:

* Animated wallpaper/screensaver.

* Do not show screensaver when a media (e.g. Video, Audio) is playing
* Do not show screensaver when browser is minimized
* Display time
* Show on all displays
* Support multiple languages

Works great on all platforms.
